extName.message: "Development Mode Alert" translates to "Modo de Desarrollo Alerta" in Spanish.

extDescription.message:
A Chrome extension to highlight development environments by adding a customizable border. 

Translated to: "Une extension Chrome pour mettre en évidence les environnements de développement en ajoutant une bordure personnalisable."

enableExtension.message: "Enable Extension" translates to "Activar Extensión" in Spanish.

borderColor.message: The translation of "Border Color" in English is "Border Color."

borderWidth.message: Border Width in English is also "Border Width" in English.

triggerURL.message: "Trigger URL" translates to "Activer URL" in English.

shortDescription.message: Highlight development environments with a customizable border.

description.message:
Dev Mode Alert is a Chrome extension designed to help developers easily differentiate between development and production environments by adding a customizable border around the browser window when visiting specified URLs. 

Translation to en: Dev Mode Alert is a Chrome extension designed to help developers easily differentiate between development and production environments by adding a customizable border around the browser window when visiting specified URLs.
